-e ---

𒊊 = 𒄊 GIR₃ GIRI₃ cry, crawl (alternative forms)

𒊊 PIRIĜ pard 𓃬 𓃮 ≈ 𒊋 𒊌 PIRIĜ bear 󳧖

𒊊 PIRIĜ bull ( male beast )

𒊊 PIRIĜ > balahı in 𒊊𒌉 төлкө балаһы tölkö balahı "cub"

𒊊 UG₂ •URSA 𒊍 AZ "bear" 󳧖 vs

𒊊 UGᵃˡ <> 𓅪 𓅫 cul klein "tiny, very small" opposites

𒊊 UG₂ ≈ uĝʳ /unger/ "anger" #aggu;uggu aggrevation NG

𒊊 ˡUG₂ "light" <> lux <> 𒈜 LIK λύκος lúkos #nūru

𒊊 ˡUG₂ •Lux a large cat; a mythical lion

𒊊 <> 𒁰 DARA4 deer 𓃴 𔑳 𔑴 𓃵

𒊊 lābu Löwe lion 𓃭 𓃬

𒊊 ŠAKKAN₂ shirkan 𓃭 𓃬

𒊊 ≈ 𒈜 ≈ 𒌋𒊊 K.AZ #kušum ᵏhass hate, height V.AZ vice, despise

𒊊 ≈ 𓃮 power, virility in Egyptian and Sumerian 𒊊𒅅 𒉈𒅅 neĝal megaˡ mighty

𒊊 𓃬 unrelated in late form:
𒊊 ≈ 𒌋𒀼·𒐀 ≈ 𒌋 sir 𒊊 ≈ 𒌋𒀼 ≈ 𒉻 ≈ 𒌋𒐼 ≈ 𒐼 ŠAr 𒊍 = 𒊊𒍝 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒍝 🐻 󳧖 bear ≠ Parza : Parther?
𒊌 = 𒊊𒌓 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒑊𒁹 leo lion ≈ 𒌓 LAH la7 liḫ
𒊋 = 𒊊𒆗 ≈ 𒉒⋅𒑲𒄑𒀀 𓃬 / 𓃮 ≈ (leo)pard

𒊊 ⇔ 𒊾 ⇔ 𒄏 𒄊 PIRIG 𒉺𒄊 pa.gir pair 𓃀 foot #šēpum

𒁾 ≈ 𒉒𒁹𒁹𒁹𒁹

𒊎 Euphrat & Tigris? Tiger ?

𒊊 PIRIĜ ⇔ 𒉿𒇻 pi-lu stag ?

𒊊 lābu 𓃬 ⋍ 𒊋 𓃮 leopard

𒊊𒌉 nemur 𒉏𒊒 nim-ru נִמְרָא nimrā 𓌳 𓅱 𓃬 •nwmrw ≈ 𓃮 leopard 𒄑𒊊𒌉

𒊊 ne₃ •might strength; force : 𒊊𒅅;𒉈𒅅 ne₃-ĝal₂;ne-ĝal₂ neĝal megaˡ "mighty" #emūqu

𒌋𒊊 c.ursa "cry some" kušum

𓌳 N 3. 𓌳 𓅱 𓃬 𒌨𒉏 𒌨𒈤 nēšum "lion" 𓃬 ≈ 𓃮 nimrā נִמְרָא 𒉏𒊒 nim-ru 𒊊𒌉 nemur leopard 𒊌 𒊊 nūru "light"
